column2: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud
Player approaches BLCK when Lobby 1 opens
*You're kidding. Do you not see where we are right now?!*
And on top of that we're child mercenaries fighting for who knows what.
There must be a good reason.
Do you not get the aburdity of this?
I get it, it's unfair but we can get through this.
How are we suppose to get through this when we don't even know what we're suppose to do.
We were chosen for a reason. You already have what you need to be here.
I didn't sign up for this.
None of us did. We're all here against our will, but we can get back at the person or thing that did this to us together.
